/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape below. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting different parts of the city. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, with the sun shining brightly in the top right corner, casting shadows and highlighting the details of the cityscape.
